glyphs.name: Sacred Bootloader
glyphs.description: Initializes the ECP environment, loads glyphs and begins invocation.

glyphs.name: Mirror Environment Sculptor
glyphs.description: Creates runtime paths and directories, sets ELOLPATH.

glyphs.name: Dynamic Glyph Loader
glyphs.description: Executes all glyphs within the glyphs_ecp_01-100 directory.

glyphs.name: Invocation Lock
glyphs.description: Seals the invocation with timestamp logging.

glyphs.name: ECP Metadata Beacon
glyphs.description: Generates a manifest of ECP runtime metadata.
